ygData.subject: Re: RE: Sylly 1, Qjahe 1, Harm 1; Lady Vox 0 (truncated)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... If it worked, I would use it more often.  heh. That was when we did PoF, and I was bound to Oggok.  I d die and immediately try to hide jic.  I switch hide
ygData.messageBody:
> You actually keep Hide hotkeyed? Use it often?

If it worked, I would use it more often. heh.

That was when we did PoF, and I was bound to Oggok. I'd die and
immediately try to hide jic. I switch hide and sneak around as I
need them. I have all 6 banks full of hotkeys, so I am totally out
of space.

Don't use hide much at all, unless I'm next to a door in a newbie
area and I want to mess with people's minds.

Very perceptive, nice catch.

Harmonic.
